Published jointly by NV, Praha and Smena, Bratislava

Dva detektivní romány připomínají autorčina detektiva Hercula Poirota. První (vražda Rogera Acroyda) je z dvacátých let a přináší drama z anglického venkova. Druhý (Pět malých prasátek) z třicátých let představuje dokonale promyšlený případ pátrání po staré vraždě.
Previously published in two volumes: The mousetrap and selected plays. 1994 ; Witness for the prosecution and selected plays. 1995.
And then there were none -- Appointment with death -- The hollow -- Witness for the prosecution -- Towards zero -- Verdict -- Go back for murder.
Agatha Christie ; retold by Anne Collins ; [illustrations by Martin Hargreaves].
Agatha Christie ; Z angl. orig. A murder is announced přel. Eva Hrubá ; Il. Jaroslav Petrželka

"Oznamuje se vražda. Bude spáchána v pátek 29. října ve vile Little Paddocks v 18.30. Přátelé, přijměte laskavě tuto zprávu místo zvláštního oznámení." Touto originální zprávou v místním časopise malého anglického městečka a současně originální expozicí rozbíhá se děj detektivního románu známé autorky. Jde o příběh z poválečné Anglie na pozadí sporů o dědictví, v němž jednu vraždu provedenou podle ohlášení v novinách a dvě další pomáhá vyšetřovat stará paní, žena bohatá životními zkušenostmi a nadaná bystrým postřehem a úsudkem.
